sub_title: Program Management | Digital Transformation | Cloud Computing | Data Analytics | Business/IT Operations | Business Partnering
summary:
Accomplished and Result-oriented Senior Manager with a strong passion for strategy, technology, and organizational transformation. I have extensive Technology Consulting, IT Management, and Project & Program management experience, as well as broad strategic and operational expertise in the areas of business case development, project initiation to execution, data analysis, and financial management. 

I have excellent track record of delivering results on a wide range of programs in IT, consulting, business transformation, post-merger integration, and operations in the technology, retail banking, and healthcare industries. . I excels at devising and implementing strategies to ensure financial and operational success of the complex projects, both individually and as part of a team. 

Key Skills & Expertise:
- Shaping Vision: Strategy, roadmap, business cases management, and project initiation/scoping
- Delivering Business/IT transformation & delivery project – Cloud, SaaS, Digital Workplace, and Security- 
- Proficient in Project & Program management: Using waterfall (PMI trained) and Agile (Certified) approaches
- Adept managing IT operations: Lean, ITIL Service management, portfolio management, vendor management
- Proven leadership: Effectively managing cross-functional & geographically dispersed teams
- Accomplished in stakeholder management, including effective client engagement and business partnering

profile_positions.description:
Led a global team of 25 resources and 22 supplier resources across 7 countries to deliver and operate mission-critical IT services for 15,000+ internal users and external customers on 20+ applications (ServiceMax, SAP, Salesforce, In-house proprietary tools, etc.)

-  Optimized the operational performance by driving standardization and leading improvement projects
       o	Reduced the ticket volume by 40% in 15 months
       o	Improved customer satisfaction by 25% in 12 months
       o	Same day resolution increased from 60% to 85% in 12 months
       o	Reduced the operation cost of the service by €0.8m/year within 18 months
-  Implemented Lean practices such as Daily Management, KPIs, problem solving, and kaizens
-  Facilitated monthly/quarterly business review meetings with Philips Leadership and Customers
-  Automated performance reporting and analysis using Power BI to drive data-driven decision making
-  Led the annual operating planning process by working closely with BG, market, and finance teams
-  Coached and mentored the team to drive Lean culture and continuous improvement mindset
-  Established strong partnership with Business Group/Market leaders to be aligned on strategy and execution
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager - Customer Service Operations & Programs

profile_positions.description:
Led a team of 15 resources to manage the delivery of Service Content platform - containing Philips product and service documentation - to 15,000+ users (Philips Field Service Engineers, , Remote Service Engineers, Customer Service Agents, and Customers)
-  Managed the Customer Service IT Knowledge Management portfolio
-  Managed the delivery of offline capability of service content delivery platform
-  Implemented a DevOps delivery model and improved the overall DevOps maturity
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager - IT Program Delivery

profile_positions.description:
Led a team of 25 resources to implement and deploy Microsoft security suite (BitLocker, Encryption, Windows Defender, Azure AD Single Sign-on, Multi-factor authentication, and Advanced Threat protection) on 90,000+ Philips devices by addressing the remote-work challenge caused by Covid-19 pandemic

-  Defined and managed the program roadmap and implementation/deployment project plans
-  Setup the program structure and configured agile scrum teams along the value stream to maximize benefits
-  Organized Scrum of Scrums to track progress and to address dependencies and challenges
-  Established program governance with the leadership and stakeholders to help drive time-critical decisions
-  Defined change management strategies and phased implementations to ensure minimize business disruption
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager - Microsoft Security Program

profile_positions.description:
Acted as a trusted advisor to Philips IT leadership on implementing the Philips multi-cloud strategy and deploying IT cloud transformation programs to help modernize the Philips Infrastructure landscape, accelerate digital transformation, and deliver significant cost savings. By 2021, 92% of the Philips IT Infrastructure landscape was migrated to AWS and Azure Clouds.

-  Delivered AWS & Azure managed cloud platforms as per Philips security, compliance, and legal requirements
-  Developed a comprehensive multi-year Cloud transformation roadmap and governance framework 
-  Conducted a thorough assessment of Philips IT Data Centers and formulated the cloud adoption strategies
-  Helped setup cloud migration programs to migrate Philips IT on-premise Infrastructure to cloud
      o  Local DC-to-Cloud – Migrated 3000 servers to public/hybrid cloud and closed 100+ data centers
      o  Global Apps to Cloud – Migrated 100+ critical apps (SAP) from on-premises data center to cloud
-  Helped setup advanced Data & Analytics platform on Azure Cloud which is used by 5,000+ data analysts, data engineers, and data scientists to analyze data and deliver actionable insights
-  Collaborated with business & technology teams to manage cloud portfolio and enhance the services
-  Managed relationships with cloud providers (AWS, Microsoft) and service providers (Wipro, Cognizant, ATOS) 
-  Organized Cloud Partner summits to cultivate a co-innovations mindset and to drive partner-led innovations
-  Analyzed the IT Operations costs, identified cost drivers, and helped setup initiatives such as Landscape simplification, Data Center to Cloud, Network transformation, Bring your own device, etc. 
-  Created commercial models for negotiation of large contracts with tier 1 IT suppliers
profile_positions.title: Cloud Product and Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Acted as a trusted advisor to the Capgemini UK Banking Leadership team and helped manage the deal process (Opportunity to proposal to negotiation to contract signature) on large IT/BPO transformation deals

-  Coordinated with account leadership, sales/delivery partners, and SME’s on business development activities
-  Setup and managed war rooms to ensure the client proposals are submitted on time with the right quality
-  Developed business cases to help the customers/clients to assess the value of the proposed solutions
-  Worked on internal strategy projects on organization structure, value creation, idea labs, and pricing
profile_positions.title: Pre-Sales Lead – Sales Operations

profile_positions.description:
Led multiple consulting engagements to embed benefits realization and performance management across large sale transformation program and associated strategic initiatives in the retail banking division of a large UK bank

-  Re-planned and re-baselined programs to align with future strategy and accelerate benefit realization
-  Developed business cases and roadmaps for strategic initiatives with financial opportunity & risk assessment
-  Developed and managed costs/benefits for multi-channel sales transformation program
-  Collaborated with retail banking product teams and technology teams to improve the online sales conversion from 8% to 34% by enhancing the user experience and addressing technical issues.
profile_positions.title: PMO and Financial Consultant – Sales/IT Transformation

profile_positions.description:
Managed Operations and Finances of a large banking account with a headcount of 1000+ employees across five countries – India, Ireland, Netherlands, UK and US.
-  Streamlined the sales-to-cash process and implemented a robust platform to control commercial risk 
-  Collaborated with sales partners to create 50+ proposals and pricing models for sales opportunities
-  Created the P&L reports and shared my observations and analysis with the leadership team
-  Prepared and facilitated monthly/quarterly business review meetings with account leadership team
-  Helped deliver sales targets by actively managing the sales funnel from lead generation to conversion
profile_positions.title: Operations and Commercial Manager –Account Operations

profile_positions.description:
Managed multiple post-merger and system integration projects to integrate acquired companies with Capgemini 
- Managed the functional integration projects of Capgemini UK Banking business with Capgemini Financial Services BU and enabled a global IT delivery model
-  Managed the IT integration project (Finance and Project Management systems) for Kanbay, acquired company, with 6000+ employees – ERP, PPM, and KM systems
-  Managed the IT integration project (Knowledge Management systems) of Adjoined, acquired company, with 300+ employees – Sales & HR systems
-  Led a team of 10 resources to deploy time & expense tool to 10,000 employees in Financial Services BU
-  Performed project management and PMI activities such as creating project plans, stakeholder management, weekly/monthly status reports with risk/issues, quarterly business reviews, and synergies/benefits tracking
profile_positions.title: Project Manager – Post Merger Integration Management Office

profile_positions.description:
Worked on various organization-wide change management and process improvement initiatives for consolidating IT landscape, restructuring IT organization, and driving operational excellence with the help of technology

-  Analyzed and improved existing support function systems/processes to deliver cost reduction of US$1.5m
-  Implemented Project & Portfolio Management tool and Knowledge Management tools for 6000+ users
-  Enhanced the interface between CA Clarity and Oracle ERP by implementing an automated re-conciliation process to reduce errors and improve financial performance 
-  Defined a new service delivery and governance model for Capgemini FS IT Operations
profile_positions.title: Business/Process Analyst - Operational Excellence & IT
